keywordspec.name: grpc_robot.VolthaTools
keywordspec.doc: Tools for the voltha, e.g decoding / conversions.

kw.name: Events Decode Event
kw.doc:
Converts bytes to an Event as defined in _message Event_ from events.proto
*Parameters*: - bytestring: <bytes>; Byte string, e.g. as it comes from Kafka messages. - return_enum_integer: <string> or <bool>; Whether or not to return the enum values as integer values rather than their labels. Default: _false_. - return_defaults: <string> or <bool>; Whether or not to return the default values. Default: _false_. - human_readable_timestamps: <string> or <bool>; Whether or not to convert the timestamps to human-readable format. Default: _true_.
*Return*: A dictionary with _event_ structure.
*Example*: | Import Library | grpc_robot.VolthaTools | WITH NAME | voltha_tools | | ${kafka_records} | kafka.Records Get | | FOR | ${kafka_record} | IN | @{kafka_records} | | | ${event} | voltha_tools.Events Decode Event | ${kafka_record}[message] | | | Log | ${event} | | END |
